summary: The Bharat PDF - A PDF tools website
architectural_notes: Green & white color theme for branding
Logo must work across desktop/mobile header and favicon sizes
Flat design aesthetic with minimal SaaS style
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern, clean logo for 'The Bharat PDF' with green primary color on transparent/white background, minimal SaaS style, incorporating a simple PDF document icon, smooth modern sans-serif font, flat design without gradients, horizontal layout suitable for website header (logo-header.dim_400x80.png)
- Favicon version of The Bharat PDF logo optimized for small display, simple PDF document icon in green, recognizable at tiny sizes, square format (favicon.dim_48x48.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a modern, clean logo image for 'The Bharat PDF' with green as the primary color, white/light background support, minimal SaaS style, incorporating a simple PDF/document/file icon element, using a smooth modern font with flat design (no heavy gradients), optimized for header display at desktop and mobile sizes
Generate a favicon version of The Bharat PDF logo optimized for small sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48 pixels) with the same green theme and recognizable PDF/document icon element

Update the Navbar component to display the new logo image in place of the current text-based branding, ensuring it blends perfectly with the existing UI without modifying any layout, functionality, or navigation structure
Update frontend/index.html to reference the new favicon files, replacing any existing favicon references without modifying other meta tags or HTML structure

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a modern, clean logo for The Bharat PDF with green & white theme, minimal SaaS style, PDF/document icon, suitable for header and favicon
